title: Pro Tip: Workflow Templates
body:
Did you know you can use pre-built templates to jumpstart your automation in Levqor?

Here's how:
1. Go to Templates
2. Browse categories
3. Click "Use Template"
4. Customize as needed

Try it now and boost your productivity!

params.action: use pre-built templates to jumpstart your automation
params.steps:
1. Go to Templates
2. Browse categories
3. Click "Use Template"
4. Customize as needed
